summary: P1/P2 Features Testing Complete - Team Dashboard, Fatigue Index auto-calculation, and Subscription system all working correctly. Backend: 12/12 tests passed. Frontend: All features verified.

issues: Console warnings about deprecated 'shadow*' style props - should use 'boxShadow'

context_for_next_testing_agent: P1/P2 features fully tested. Team Dashboard shows aggregated stats, alerts, risk distribution donut chart, and athletes list sorted by risk. Fatigue index is automatically calculated based on power_drop (>30% = fatigue >80%). Subscription page shows 3 plans with regional pricing toggle (BR/International).

verified_features.team_dashboard_api: VERIFIED - /api/dashboard/team returns stats, athletes, risk_distribution, position_summary, alerts
verified_features.team_dashboard_stats: VERIFIED - Shows total_athletes, athletes_high_risk, team_avg_acwr (1.89), team_avg_wellness (5.6), team_avg_fatigue (50%), sessions_this_week (7)
verified_features.team_dashboard_alerts: VERIFIED - Shows power drop alert (31%) and high ACWR alert (1.89)
verified_features.team_dashboard_risk_distribution: VERIFIED - Donut chart shows 1 athlete in 'High' risk
verified_features.team_dashboard_athletes_list: VERIFIED - Shows Test Athlete with ACWR 1.89, Fatigue 50%, High risk badge
verified_features.team_dashboard_position_summary: VERIFIED - Shows Midfielder with ACWR 1.89 and '1 at risk'
verified_features.strength_analysis_api: VERIFIED - /api/analysis/strength returns fatigue_index, fatigue_alert, peripheral_fatigue_detected, metrics, recommendations
verified_features.subscription_plans_br: VERIFIED - 3 plans with BRL pricing (R$ 39,90, R$ 89,90, R$ 159,90)
verified_features.subscription_region_toggle: VERIFIED - Switches between Brasil (R$) and International ($)
verified_features.add_strength_navigation: VERIFIED - P0 bug fixed, navigates to /athlete/{id}/add-strength correctly
verified_features.team_tab_in_bottom_tabs: VERIFIED - Team tab visible in bottom navigation with analytics icon

mocked_apis.In-App Purchase: Payment processing is MOCKED - no real App Store/Google Play integration

test_data_used.strength_assessments: 13 assessments, latest with power_drop 35% and fatigue_index 92.5%
